StrRes.Text: Determines whether to expand the report outline or not

StrRes.Text: Paper size to print report on. Used if PrintMode is not pmDefault

StrRes.Text: Reset page number/total pages numbers when print a group. Should be used with StartNewPage option set to true

StrRes.Text: Determines whether to print pages in reversed order

StrRes.Text: Determines whether to draw a solid-filled arrow

StrRes.Text: Endless page mode. If true, page will grow depending on number of data records on it

StrRes.Text: Endless page mode. If true, page will grow depending on number of data records on it
